model_information.name: text-embedding-ada-002
model_information.description: A versatile and efficient model for generating numerical representations of text for tasks such as text search, similarity, and code search.

specifications.capabilities: Generates embeddings for various applications including content personalization, recommendation, and search functionalities.
specifications.limitations: Does not outperform text-similarity-davinci-001 in SentEval linear probing classification benchmarks.
specifications.output_format: Numerical embeddings in a vector format.

performance_metrics.accuracy: Outperforms previous models in text search, code search, and sentence similarity tasks.
performance_metrics.efficiency: Features a smaller embedding size of 1536 dimensions and longer context length up to 8192 tokens for enhanced performance.
performance_metrics.scalability: Reduced computational and storage requirements due to smaller embedding size and cost reduction.

ethical_considerations.bias: Like all models, it may replicate biases present in its training data.
ethical_considerations.use_cases: Optimal for applications requiring understanding of textual or code similarity and search functionalities.
ethical_considerations.data_source: Trained on a diverse set of internet texts and code repositories.

versioning_and_updates.update_policy: Updates will be announced as new improvements are made.
versioning_and_updates.changelog: Introduced as a more capable, cost-effective replacement for five previous models with enhanced performance and efficiency.
